com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.gestures

Interface CoverListener


  • public interface CoverListener
    The listener interface for receiving cover events. The class that is interested in processing a cover event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the component's addCoverListener method. When the cover event occurs, that object's appropriate method is invoked.
    See Also:
    CoverEvent

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCover(int id, long timestamp)
      Invoked on a cover event.
      void onUncover(int id, long timestamp)
      Invoked on an uncover event.
